tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE energy_rebates (
    rebate_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    business_name VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    incentive_description TEXT,
    rebate_amount DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE,
    end_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE BusinessEnergyUsage (
 usage_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
 business_id UUID,
 energy_consumed DECIMAL,
 rebate_received DECIMAL,
 incentive_applied DECIMAL
);

CREATE TABLE energy_rebates (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  business_name VARCHAR(255),
  rebate_amount DECIMAL,
  rebate_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE incentives (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  incentive_type VARCHAR(255),
  incentive_amount DECIMAL,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE businesses (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  business_name VARCHAR(255),
  industry VARCHAR(255),
  contact_person VARCHAR(255),
  contact_email VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE energy_usage (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  business_id INT,
  usage_date DATE,
  energy_consumed DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE energy_rebates (
    rebate_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    business_name VARCHAR(255),
    rebate_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    rebate_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE energy_incentives (
    incentive_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    incentive_name VARCHAR(255),
    incentive_description TEXT,
    incentive_amount DECIMAL(10,2),
    incentive_start_date DATE,
    incentive_end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE business_info (
    business_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    business_name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE,
    industry VARCHAR(100),
    contact_name VARCHAR(100),
    phone_number VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE rebate_applications (
    application_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    business_id INT,
    rebate_id INT,
    application_date DATE,
    status VARCHAR(20)
)

CREATE TABLE incentive_selection (
    selection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    business_id INT,
    incentive_id INT,
    selection_date DATE
)
